title: Frida Baby 4-in-1 Grow-with-Me Bath Tub| Transforms Infant Bathtub to Toddler Bath Seat with Backrest for Assisted Sitting in Tub
description: Bathing baby can be a pain in the splash with all the gear you need for every stage they go through. The Grow-With-Me Bath Tub is the one-and-done solution for bathing newborns to toddlers. A color-coded bath pad cradles newborns on the aqua side, and flips to support + secure babies who are learning to sit up. Remove the pad completely for toddlers to give them space to soak and splash. Hang the bath tub to dry thanks to its built-in hook. It's a bath made in heaven!
